resources.name: financial api 1.0
resources.description: api to create customers, accounts and make transfers

resources.contents: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"api to create customers, accounts and make transfers","version":"1.0","title":"financial api"},"host":"localhost:8080","basePath":"/","tags":[{"name":"account-controller","description":"Account Controller"},{"name":"customer-controller","description":"Customer Controller"},{"name":"customer-transaction-controller","description":"Customer Transaction Controller"}],"paths":{"/account":{"post":{"tags":["account-controller"],"summary":"create","operationId":"createUsingPOST","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["*/*"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"accountCustomer","description":"The object used to create the account","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountCustomerPostRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AccountCustomerPostResponse"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"203":{"description":"account created"},"400":{"description":"bad request"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}},"put":{"tags":["account-controller"],"summary":"makeTransfer","operationId":"makeTransferUsingPUT","consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["*/*"],"parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"transferPutRequest","description":"the transfer object","required":true,"schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/TransferPutRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"transfer completed","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Unit"}},"201":{"description":"Created"},"400":{"description":"bad request, check the accounts, intended transfer value or balances"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}},"/customer":{"get":{"tags":["customer-controller"],"summary":"list","operationId":"listUsingGET","produces":["*/*"],"responses":{"200":{"description":"returns the list of all customers","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/CustomerResponse"}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"nor even a customer was found"}}}},"/customer-transactions":{"get":{"tags":["customer-transaction-controller"],"summary":"getTransactionByAccount","operationId":"getTransactionByAccountUsingGET","produces":["*/*"],"parameters":[{"name":"accountId","in":"query","description":"The account id to retrieve the transactions from","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"returns the list of all transactions","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/CustomerTransactionResponse"}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"nor even a transaction was found"}}}},"/customer/account/{accountId}":{"get":{"tags":["customer-controller"],"summary":"findByAccount","operationId":"findByAccountUsingGET","produces":["*/*"],"parameters":[{"name":"accountId","in":"path","description":"the account id to retrieve the customer from","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"returns the customer","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/CustomerResponse"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"element not found"}}}}},"definitions":{"AccountCustomerPostRequest":{"type":"object","required":["accountBalance","accountId","customerId","customerName"],"properties":{"accountBalance":{"type":"number"},"accountId":{"type":"string"},"customerId":{"type":"string"},"customerName":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountCustomerPostRequest"},"AccountCustomerPostResponse":{"type":"object","required":["accountBalance","accountId","customerId","customerName"],"properties":{"accountBalance":{"type":"number"},"accountId":{"type":"string"},"customerId":{"type":"string"},"customerName":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountCustomerPostResponse"},"CustomerResponse":{"type":"object","required":["id","name"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CustomerResponse"},"CustomerTransactionResponse":{"type":"object","required":["completed","controlCode","destinationAccountId","originAccountId","transactionDate","transactionValue","type"],"properties":{"completed":{"type":"boolean"},"controlCode":{"type":"string"},"destinationAccountId":{"type":"string"},"originAccountId":{"type":"string"},"transactionDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"transactionValue":{"type":"number"},"type":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CustomerTransactionResponse"},"TransferPutRequest":{"type":"object","required":["destinationAccountId","intendedValue","originAccountId"],"properties":{"destinationAccountId":{"type":"string"},"intendedValue":{"type":"number"},"originAccountId":{"type":"string"}},"title":"TransferPutRequest"},"Unit":{"type":"object","title":"Unit"}}}
